## Non-technical resources

These are resources that can be used for an essay/reading exercise or class discussion. 

### `pudding.cool`

Examples:

- [Chinese censorship of the *Big Bang Theory*](https://pudding.cool/2022/08/censorship/) 
- [Comparing pocket sizes on women's and men's clothing](https://pudding.cool/2018/08/pockets/)
- [How artists get paid from music streaming](https://pudding.cool/2022/06/streaming/)
- [Randomness and age](https://pudding.cool/2022/04/random/). Perhaps suitable for Lesson 38 on "false discovery."
- [Coughing and the Academy awards](https://journal-doi.org/10.731/pcbi.1007742/) (The link was through <pudding.cool>.)
- [NBA draft](https://pudding.cool/2022/02/redraft/)
- [Writing plainly](https://pudding.cool/2022/02/plain/)
- many others!
